name: You booped me! D
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 47 with the theme Stuck In A Loop

You are O and you are stuck making loops around your magenta D:
To get out of the loop you will have to boop it with lazzzers!

Controls
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Dash - A/D/Left/Right
  • Boop - Mouse/W/S/Up/Down
Credits

BGM: Kevin MacLeod - Blown Away

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - Game Design, VFX, Programming

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - Game Design, Programming, SFX

Alexander Kopiy (@kopiy_that) - Support
